page.title: 19Bellsdyke Hospital
page.content: "One in six people will spend time in a{mental hospital.}"A group of primary school children visited Bellsdyke{ {psychiatric hospital}to see what it was like and found that the main aim is to rehabilitate patients as fast as possible-{short term patients}.For the {long term patients},the aim was to make their lives as happy and fulfilled as possible.The hospital has a village atmosphere with well laid out grounds and a vast range of activities-putting,art,disco dancing .Patients are encouraged to go on holiday,support football teams,have their hair done at the hospital salons.They can help in the hospital,or grounds or with the soft toy,picture framing,hut making etc.The visitors were impressed by the sincere care,concern and enthusiasm of the staff they met.
